casebody.data:
2002-1.901 (La. 10/25/02)

Adam CLIATT v. T.J. WARD GENERAL CONTRACTORS, INC., et al. No. 2002-CC-1901. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re T.J. Ward General Contractors Inc. et al.; Assurance Company of America; — Defendant(s); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Orleans, Orleans Parish Civil District Court Div. K, No. 00-10050; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2002-C-0716.

Denied.

JOHNSON, J., recused.
